Welcome

I'm a A propagandist for pickled red onions, rare meat activist, and Captain of the sailing vessel Knox. I've been creating content online for well over a decade now, but delivering to a very small audience. Undoubtedly, you've discovered this website by mistake, but thanks for stopping by anyway--and, feel free to browse around, odds are you might find something interesting.

The Best Value in the History of Literature


Setting up BSPWM on Fedora Workstation

A guide for setting up a working instance of my BSPWM configuration on a clean install of Fedora Workstation. Note: I have only tested this on version 43 and above on x86 platforms.

Cloning This Webiste & Getting Set-up for Development with Eleventy

A quick guide for cloning this site's repository via git & getting set up for development on a new system. I use Eleventy (11ty) as a static site generator & Airtable as a sort of a CMS solution. This documentation will walk through cloning this website's repository from GitHub, installing all required dependencies, insuring all NPM plugins are installed, and testing to ensure that the new machine is ready for further development.
